com.lpoo.game.view.screens

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    A view representing the game screen. Draws all the other views and controls the camera.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera
      The camera used to show the viewport.

      Used for Camera looseness.

      And Handler used to listen to the User's input.

      Integer that saves the value of the current Level (Level 0, Level 1, ...).
      private static boolean DEBUG_PHYSICS
      Used to debug the position of the physics fixtures
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4 debugCamera
      The transformation matrix used to transform meters into pixels in order to show fixtures in their correct places.

      A renderer used to debug the physical fixtures.

      The current game session.

      The Game's background Image.

      Map's Renderer of the current level's map.

      The game Model of the current Game being played by the User.

      How much meters does a pixel represent.

      Shape's renderer of the current level's shapes.

      The height of the viewport in meters.
      private static float VIEWPORT_WIDTH
      The width of the viewport in meters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen(Armadillo game,
                  int currentLevel)
        Game Screen's constructor. The Game Screen's is responsible for drawing the current game.
        Parameters:
        game - The current game session.
        currentLevel - The game's level that the game screen will draw.
